title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 523/96 of 26 March 1996 adjusting the maximum annual fishing effort for certain fisheries
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 523/96 of 26 March 1996 adjusting the maximum annual fishing effort for certain fisheries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The maximum annual fishing effort for the Kingdom of the Netherlands in respect of demersal species using towed gear, as referred to in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No 2027/95, is amended as laid down in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 18 March 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 March 1996.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 199, 24. 8. 1995, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 71, 31. 3. 1995, p. 5.
(3) OJ No L 330, 30. 12. 1995, p. 1.
